title: Solli Tholaiyen Ma Lyrics Yaakkai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Yaakkai Solli Tholaiyen Ma Song Lyrics English Meaning
#YuvanShankarRaja #Dhanush

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Kaanaa pona kadhala
naana kenji ketkuren
pona pogudhu kadhala
solli tholaiyen ma

veenaa neram pogudhu
en maanam
kappal yerudhu
thaana vandhu
kaadhala
solli tholaiyen ma

nee ok solli
tholanjaa
thara kuththa
poduven.

illa venaa
solla thuninjaa
soga songa paaduven

unaku wait panniye
body weak aagudhu
basement shake aagudhu
heartu break aagudhu

love-a sollaadhadhaal
nenju lock aagudhu
current illaadha
oorr pola
dark aagudhu.

Vaaram onnula
kanavula vandha.
Vaaram rendula
manasula vandha
moonaam varame
raththathulayum neethaan

ada yemma yemma
nalla paakkura
koochcha padaama nee
nallaa eelikkura
lova sonna mattum
yaemma morakkura
sariye illama
ada pomaa pomaa

no no summa
sonnen
unakkaaga porandhavan
naan mattumthaanmaa

Unkooda vazhave
dhinam dhorum
saaguren
kaapaaththa kadhala
solli tholaiyen maa

pona pogudhu kadhala
solli tholaiyen ma

unaku wait panniye
wait panniye..

unaku wait panniye
body weak aagudhu
basement shake aagudhu
heartu break aagudhu

love-a sollaadhadhaal
nenju lock aagudhu
current illaadha
oorr pola
dark aagudhu.
English Meaning
I tried my best :)
I plead for the
Love I lost.
Let it go and please
tell me your love.

Time is going useless
I am loosing
My prestige
Please come
by yourself and
tell me your love.

If you tell
me OK
I will dance for
beat song

else if you
dare to say no
I’ll sing a sad song.

My body get weak
waiting for you.
legs are shivering
heart is breaking..

My chest is locked
Coz of not saying ur love.
It's getting dark
like a city without
power.

First week
You came in dream.
Second week
You came in my heart
Third week
You were in my blood.

Why the hell you
are looking at me.
You’re always smiling
without shyness.
But why are you staring
When i say my love.
This is not good
Go away..

No no I lied
You
I am the only one
born for you.

To live with you
I am dieing
Every day
please tell your
Love to save me.

Let it to
Tell your love.

Having waited for you..
Having waited ..

My body get weak
waiting for you.
legs are shivering
heart is breaking..

My chest is locked
Coz of not saying ur love.
It's getting dark
like a city without
power.
